definitions.text: a railway that is powered by electricity and that runs on a track that is raised above the street level
give a promotion to or assign to a higher position
examples: John was kicked upstairs when a replacement was hired
Women tend not to advance in the major law firms
I got promoted after many years of hard work

definitions.text: raise from a lower to a higher position

examples: The new law lifted many people from poverty

definitions.text: of high moral or intellectual value; elevated in nature or style; ; - Oliver Franks
examples: argue in terms of high-flown ideals
